A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
Hyper-drives can be used Kamakaie style and a ship 1/20th the size can ram another ship and slice it in half. If that is the case\, why haven't the rebels been doing that ...to take out the much larger empire ships???

when did Leia get Force training?

Why are Rose and Finn such shitty actors. 

Why mention Phasma or Snoke if you are just going to kill them off?

Why such heavy handed politcal elements\, like animal conservation\, capitalism and wealth gaps

Why go to Canto?

Where did they get a ship to go to Canto\, given the hanger was destroyed?

If Tie fighters could catch up to the ship... why didn't they make a boarding party

Why didn't half the pursuing fleet just hyperdrive in front of the Rebels... locking them in

Why was the dark jedi hole such a disappointment?

"God's Speed" ? Who the fuck is god? Why not say "May the force be with you"... that is what it means. 

Why watch your friends die for 10 minutes\, before making the decision to slam your ship into Snokes ship?

Some good cinematography\, the only scene worth seeing ...even if it meant Snoke needlessly died.

Why make Luke a comic character drink walrus breast milk. 

Why ALL the campy lines...way way too much humor... 

Why make Chewbacca a bitch

So...Luke was killed in the end. 

I am just tired of even thinking about all these flaws
